subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo had 29 points, 18 rebounds and 13 assists — prompting chants of “M.V.P.” — as the Celtics tied their series against the Cavaliers at two games each.
snippet: Rajon Rondo had 29 points, 18 rebounds and 13 assists — prompting chants of “M.V.P.” — as the Celtics tied their series against the Cavaliers at two games each.
